00056     WorldNode::WorldNode(const String& Name, SceneManager* manager)
00057     {
00058         Manager = manager;
00059         OgreNode = Manager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->createSceneNode(Name);
00060         Type = WorldNode::Free;
00061     }
00062 
00063     WorldNode::WorldNode(Ogre::SceneNode* snode, SceneManager* manager)
00064     {
00065         OgreNode = snode;
00066         Manager = manager;
00067         Type = WorldNode::Free;
00068     }
00069 
00070     WorldNode::~WorldNode()
00071     {
00072         Manager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->destroySceneNode(OgreNode);
00073     }
00074 
00075     ConstString& WorldNode::GetName() const
00076     {
00077         return OgreNode->getName();
00078     }
00079 
00080     void WorldNode::AttachElement(Attachable* Element)
00081     {
00082         Attachable::AttachableElement Type = Element->GetElementType();
00083         switch (Type)
00084         {
00085             case Attachable::ParticleEffect:
00086             {
00087                 ParticleEffect* particle = static_cast< ParticleEffect* > (Element);
00088                 OgreNode->addChild(particle->OgreNode);
00089                 //OgreNode->attachObject(particle->OgreParticle);
00090             }
00091             break;
00092             case Attachable::Camera:
00093             {
00094                 Camera* camera = static_cast< Camera* > (Element);
00095                 OgreNode->attachObject(camera->Cam);
00096             }
00097             break;
00098             case Attachable::Light:
00099             {
00100                 Light* light = static_cast< Light* > (Element);
00101                 OgreNode->attachObject(light->OgreLight);
00102             }
00103             break;
00104             default:
00105                 throw(phys::Exception("Could not Attach element of unknown type to WorldNode."));
00106                 return;
00107         }
00108         Element->SetAttachedTo(this);
00109         Elements.push_back(Element);
00110         return;
00111     }
00112 
00113     void WorldNode::DetachElement(Attachable* Element)
00114     {
00115         Attachable::AttachableElement Type = Element->GetElementType();
00116         switch (Type)
00117         {
00118             case Attachable::ParticleEffect:
00119             {
00120                 ParticleEffect* particle = static_cast< ParticleEffect* > (Element);
00121                 OgreNode->detachObject(particle->OgreParticle);
00122             }
00123             break;
00124             case Attachable::Camera:
00125             {
00126                 Camera* camera = static_cast< Camera* > (Element);
00127                 OgreNode->detachObject(camera->Cam);
00128             }
00129             break;
00130             case Attachable::Light:
00131             {
00132                 Light* light = static_cast< Light* > (Element);
00133                 OgreNode->detachObject(light->OgreLight);
00134             }
00135             break;
00136             default:
00137                 throw(phys::Exception("Could not Detach element of unknown type to WorldNode."));
00138                 return;
00139         }
00140         Element->SetAttachedTo(0);
00141         for( std::vector< Attachable* >::iterator it = Elements.begin() ; it != Elements.end() ; it++ )
00142         {
00143             if( Element == (*it) )
00144             {
00145                 Elements.erase(it);
00146                 return;
00147             }
00148         }
00149         return;
00150     }
00151 
00152     void WorldNode::DetachAllElements()
00153     {
00154         OgreNode->detachAllObjects();
00155         Elements.clear();
00156     }
00157 
00158     Whole WorldNode::GetNumAttachedElements()
00159     {
00160         return Elements.size();
00161     }
00162 
00163     void WorldNode::SetPosition(Vector3 Position)
00164     {
00165         OgreNode->setPosition(Position.GetOgreVector3());
00166     }
00167 
00168     Vector3 WorldNode::GetPosition()
00169     {
00170         Vector3 Pos(OgreNode->getPosition());
00171         return Pos;
00172     }

00174     void WorldNode::SetOrientation(Quaternion Orientation)
00175     {
00176         OgreNode->setOrientation(Orientation.GetOgreQuaternion());
00177     }
00178 
00179     Quaternion WorldNode::GetOrientation()
00180     {
00181         Quaternion Ori(OgreNode->getOrientation());
00182         return Ori;
00183     }
00184 
00185     void WorldNode::LookAt(Vector3 LookAt)
00186     {
00187         OgreNode->lookAt(LookAt.GetOgreVector3(), Ogre::Node::TS_WORLD);
00188     }
00189 
00190     void WorldNode::SetAutoTracking(WorldNode* node, Vector3 Offset)
00191     {
00192         OgreNode->setAutoTracking(true, node->OgreNode, Ogre::Vector3::NEGATIVE_UNIT_Z, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00193     }
00194 
00195     void WorldNode::SetAutoTracking(ActorBase* Actor, Vector3 Offset)
00196     {
00197         OgreNode->setAutoTracking(true, Actor->GraphicsNode, Ogre::Vector3::NEGATIVE_UNIT_Z, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00198     }
00199 
00200     void WorldNode::DisableAutoTracking()
00201     {
00202         OgreNode->setAutoTracking(false);
00203     }
00204 
00205     void WorldNode::IncrementOrbit(Real Radians)
00206     {
00207         if( WorldNode::Orbit == this->Type )
00208         {
00209             Ogre::Radian Rad(Radians);
00210             OgreNode->getParentSceneNode()->yaw(Rad);
00211         }
00212     }
00213 
00214     void WorldNode::SetType(WorldNode::NodeType type)
00215     {
00216         Type = type;
00217     }
00218 
00219     WorldNode::NodeType WorldNode::GetType()
00220     {
00221         return Type;
00222     }
